## Import Code
```{r import}
data <- read.csv("simulated_data.csv")
colnames(data) <- c('Time', 'Base', 'Noise_1', 'Noise5', 'Noise10', 'ReturnBase', 'Return1', 'Return5', 'Return10')
head(data)
```

## Round 1: n=30
```{r 1}
# set starting number of obs (n)
n <- 30

# subset data into (1:n) and (n+1, end)
d30_1 <- data[1:n, ]
   # OR: data %>% filter(Time <= n)
d30_2 <- data[-c(1:n), ]
   # OR: data %>% filter(Time > n)

# from first section of data, create slr
lm(Base ~ Time, data=d30_1)


```
